executive.title: Digital Marketing Basics
executive.desc:
Jobs in the Digital Marketing Field
  1. Digital Marketing Manager
    Role- The Manager is accountable for implementing, maintaining and creating a marketing campaign that intends to promote the client’s products & services. However, they are at a senior position responsible for brand awareness in the Digital World.
    Average Salary: 4 to 6 LPA
  2. Digital marketing strategist
    Role- A Strategist is accountable for coming up with creative solutions that help in promoting the client’s brand objectives.
    Average Salary: 5 to 7 LPA

Digital marketing is a term that we all listen to almost every day, as we all are occupied by this trend. So in simple words it is about the promotion of products and services using the electronic mediums. The advanced digital marketing course deals with all the aspects of digital marketing that in other words can be terms as online marketing, internet marketing or web marketing. It includes a huge number of modules in itself. It is not easy define the term but it has helped a great number of businesses in terms of marketing and branding. However, one can make a good amount of money with digital marketing skills as its scope is wide in the industry.

executive.title: Website Development | Creation | Webmaster
executive.desc:
Jobs in the Website Creation Field
  1. Freelance as a Website Designer & Developer
    You can earn good amount of money if you end up building websites for small businesses on Wordpress as by now you will know the best possible ways to make a website. With the growth in the industry a lot of people are driven towards taking their business online, however, this can be a great opportunity for you.

One of the most important digital marketing modules is website introduction, as web pages are the best way to grab your visitor’s attention. However, the main game is to make the visitor stay on your page as the average viewers attention is fixed on a website for less than minute. Therefore, it is important to build a website that will help the audience learn something new and also return back to your website. Retention of the audience plays a major role, as what you can show the audience in the first minute once he/she lands on the website.

executive.title: Search Engine Optimization
executive.desc:
Jobs in the SEO Field
  1. Search Engine Optimizer
    Role - Search Engine Optimizer is responsible for ranking the website and increasing the visibility on the search engines using the specific keywords.
    Average Salary: 3 to 4 LPA
  2. SEO analyst
    Role- SEO Analyst is accountable for analyzing the website content and whether it is reaching its target audience.
    Average Salary: 2.5-3.5 LPA

Search Engine Optimization, commonly named as SEO is one of the most crucial modules of the digital marketing course as it helps in ranking the website. Once you build a website it is important to be seen by the audience. However, the process includes increasing the quality and the quantity of the website traffic. It assists in increasing the visibility of the website. It may be a slow process but it surely makes a huge difference once you rank on the search engines.

executive.title: Google + Bing Ads
executive.desc:
Jobs in the Digital Advertising Field
  1. Google Ads specialist
    Role- An ads specialist plays a major role in the company, as the entire budget depends on them. We help you in specializing search ads, display ads, and Google mobile ads.
    Average Salary: 6 to 7 LPA
  2. PPC Search Manager
    Role- Search Manager’s responsibility includes putting up the Pay per Click Campaign and strategies for clients.
    Average Salary: 8-9 LPA

Almost all of you are aware of the Google Ads as they are highly prominent; however, it is a way of ranking on the search engines with the help of paid promotions. It is like advertising your product or services on the digital platforms, therefore it is a platform developed by Google. It is a paid service where advertisers pay a cost for the advertisement they want to show. There are several ways to showcase the ads like product listing, video content and several other ways. Learn the best ways to run Google Ads from WAMP Institute.

executive.title: Social Media Marketing
executive.desc:
Jobs in the Social Media Field
  1. Social Media Marketing Expert
    Role- An expert accountable for creating and analyzing the social media strategies for a business or a brand to increase their user base.
    Average Salary: 5-6 LPA
  2. Social Media Specialist
    Role- Social Media Specialist has to plan, monitor and execute the social media strategies to increase brand awareness for the business using the social media platforms.
    Average Salary: 3-4 LPA

Social Media Marketing uses the Social platforms to promote the products and services. Though, Digital Marketing is a term often used and people are familiar with it. But Social Media Marketing is acquiring its importance in the field at a great pace. Social Media platforms are like an opportunity for both practitioners and researchers. It also includes the management of marketing campaigns keeping in mind the target audience.

crash-course.title: Web Development
crash-course.desc: Advanced Digital Marketing Course also focuses on website creation as someone who wants to learn digital marketing surely wants to create a website as website plays an essential role in digital marketing. However, you will learn how to create a website on wordpress and by professionals, and it does not require you to learn any sort of coding. Therefore, once you build a website you are ready to start several things like SEO.
